entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
